widget.name: FSCalendar
widget.description: Mendix Widget wrapping the Five Stones RCT-big-calendar library

property.caption: Start Date
property.description: Date the calendar will open to. If no value given, will default to today's date

property.caption: Currently Selected Date
property.description: Attribute where the currently selected date will be stored. "onDateSelected" will trigger when this property is updated

property.caption: Currently Selected Date
property.description: Attribute where the currently selected date will be stored. "onDateSelected" will trigger when this property is updated

property.caption: Currently Selected Event
property.description: Attribute where the currently selected event will be stored. "onEventSelected" will trigger when this property is updated

property.caption: Selected Date Change
property.description: Event that is triggered when a date is selected

property.caption: Event Item Selected
property.description: Event that is triggered when an Event is selected
